Text: I dont know how to run this on EPSXE, is the first game that i cant run with this emulator. Please tell me how to run the WIPEOUT2.mdf.

1) mount the mds (or mdf) file in a virtual drive
2) launch epsxe from the exe
3) select run > from CD-ROM (you may have to configure the plugin to point it to the correct drive letter)
